definitions: Arranged in or constituting a constant or definite pattern, especially with the same space between individual instances.
(of a structure or arrangement) arranged in or constituting a symmetrical or harmonious pattern.
(of a flower) having radial symmetry.
Recurring at uniform intervals.
Done or happening frequently.
Doing the same thing often or at uniform intervals.
Defecating or menstruating at predictable times or intervals.
Conforming to or governed by an accepted standard of procedure or convention.
Of or belonging to the permanent professional armed forces of a country.
Properly trained or qualified and pursuing a full-time occupation.
Subject to or bound by religious rule; belonging to a religious or monastic order.
Rightly so called; complete; absolute (used for emphasis)
Used, done, or happening on a habitual basis; usual.
Of a normal or ordinary kind.
Not pretentious or arrogant; ordinary and friendly.
Denoting merchandise, especially food or clothing, of average or standard size.
(in surfing and other board sports) with the left leg in front of the right on the board.
(of a word) following the normal pattern of inflection.
(of a figure) having all sides and all angles equal.
(of a solid) bounded by a number of equal figures.
